info.name: Menu Item CRUD API
info.description:
Complete Postman collection for testing Menu Item CRUD operations & Excel Import/Export

**Features:**
- ‚úÖ Full CRUD operations (8 APIs)
- ‚úÖ Excel Export/Import operations (5 APIs)
- ‚úÖ Pre-configured requests with validation
- ‚úÖ Example responses
- ‚úÖ Environment variables support
- ‚úÖ Automated test scripts (50+ tests)

**API Groups:**
1. **Read Operations** (4 APIs)
   - Get all menu items
   - Get menu item by ID (with reviews)
   - Get items by category
   - Get all items (admin)

2. **Create Operation** (1 API)
   - Create new menu item

3. **Update Operation** (1 API)
   - Update menu item

4. **Delete Operations** (2 APIs)
   - Soft delete menu item
   - Hard delete menu item (permanent)

5. **Excel Operations** (5 APIs)
   - Export menu items to Excel
   - Download Excel template
   - Import (Strict mode)
   - Import (Update mode)
   - Import (Skip mode)

**How to use:**
1. Import this file into Postman
2. Import environment file (MenuItem_API.postman_environment.json)
3. Run requests in sequence or use Collection Runner
4. Check test results in Test Results tab
5. For Excel APIs: Prepare Excel files for upload

**Excel Import Modes:**
- **Strict**: B√°o l·ªói n·∫øu tr√πng t√™n (default)
- **Update**: T·ª± ƒë·ªông update n·∫øu tr√πng
- **Skip**: B·ªè qua n·∫øu tr√πng

**Created by:** Senior Backend Developer
**Date:** October 18, 2025
**Version:** 2.0 (with Excel support)

C·∫≠p nh·∫≠t th√¥ng tin m√≥n ƒÉn.

request.description:
X√≥a m·ªÅm m√≥n ƒÉn (soft delete - set is_available = 0).

**Endpoint:** DELETE `/api/menu/admin/menus/:id`

**Features:**
- Set `is_available = 0`
- Kh√¥ng x√≥a kh·ªèi database
- C√≥ th·ªÉ kh√¥i ph·ª•c b·∫±ng Update API
- Gi·ªØ nguy√™n t·∫•t c·∫£ relationships
- Safe cho production

**Use Cases:**
- M√≥n t·∫°m h·∫øt h√†ng
- M√≥n theo m√πa
- ·∫®n m√≥n kh·ªèi menu nh∆∞ng gi·ªØ history

S·ª≠ d·ª•ng Update API v·ªõi `is_available: true`

request.description:
‚ö†Ô∏è **C·∫®N TH·∫¨N!** X√≥a vƒ©nh vi·ªÖn m√≥n ƒÉn kh·ªèi database (hard delete).

**Endpoint:** DELETE `/api/menu/admin/menus/:id/permanent`

**‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING:**
- X√≥a vƒ©nh vi·ªÖn kh·ªèi database
- **KH√îNG TH·ªÇ** kh√¥i ph·ª•c
- X√≥a t·∫•t c·∫£ relationships
- X√≥a t·∫•t c·∫£ reviews
- Update order history (set item_id = NULL)

**Transaction Flow:**
1. Delete from `menu_item_categories`
2. Delete from `menu_reviews`
3. Update `order_items` (set item_id = NULL)
4. Delete from `menu_items`
5. Rollback if any error

**Security:**
- Ch·ªâ Super Admin ƒë∆∞·ª£c d√πng
- Y√™u c·∫ßu confirmation t·ª´ user
- Log action ƒë·ªÉ audit
- N√™n d√πng soft delete thay th·∫ø

**Use Cases:**
- D·ªçn d·∫πp test data
- X√≥a m√≥n b·ªã duplicate
- Admin request ƒë·∫∑c bi·ªát

item.name: Excel Operations

exec: pm.test("Response body is not empty", function () {

request.description:
Xu·∫•t danh s√°ch menu items ra file Excel v·ªõi ƒë·ªãnh d·∫°ng ƒë·∫πp.

**Endpoint:** GET `/api/menu/admin/menus/export/excel`

**Features:**
- Xu·∫•t t·∫•t c·∫£ menu items v·ªõi category names
- File Excel c√≥ ƒë·ªãnh d·∫°ng ƒë·∫πp: m√†u s·∫Øc, border, alignment
- Header c√≥ m√†u xanh d∆∞∆°ng ƒë·∫≠m
- Price format: "#,##0 VNƒê"
- Auto-fit column width
- T√™n file t·ª± ƒë·ªông: `menu_items_YYYYMMDD_HHmmss.xlsx`

**Response:**
- Content-Type: `application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet`
- Content-Disposition: `attachment; filename="menu_items_*.xlsx"`
- Binary Excel file

**Columns:**
1. ID
2. Menu Item Name
3. Price (VNƒê format)
4. Description
5. Category Name
6. Image URL
7. Available Status
8. Created At
9. Updated At

T·∫£i xu·ªëng template Excel ƒë·ªÉ import menu items.

**Endpoint:** GET `/api/menu/admin/menus/template/excel`

**Features:**
- Template c√≥ s·∫µn format chu·∫©n
- Bao g·ªìm 2 d√≤ng d·ªØ li·ªáu m·∫´u
- Header c√≥ h∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n chi ti·∫øt
- ƒê·ªãnh d·∫°ng ƒë·∫πp, d·ªÖ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng

**Response:**
- File name: `menu_item_import_template.xlsx`
- Content-Type: Excel file

**Template Structure:**
- **Row 1**: Header (m√†u xanh d∆∞∆°ng)
- **Row 2-3**: D·ªØ li·ªáu m·∫´u

**Columns:**
1. **name** (required): T√™n m√≥n ƒÉn
2. **price** (required): Gi√° (s·ªë, kh√¥ng c√≥ ƒë∆°n v·ªã)
3. **description** (optional): M√¥ t·∫£ m√≥n ƒÉn
4. **category_id** (optional): ID c·ªßa category (ph·∫£i t·ªìn t·∫°i)
5. **image_url** (optional): URL h√¨nh ·∫£nh
6. **is_available** (optional): `true` ho·∫∑c `false` (default: true)

**H∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n s·ª≠ d·ª•ng:**
1. T·∫£i template n√†y
2. ƒêi·ªÅn d·ªØ li·ªáu t·ª´ row 2 tr·ªü ƒëi
3. X√≥a 2 d√≤ng m·∫´u n·∫øu kh√¥ng c·∫ßn
4. ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o category_id h·ª£p l·ªá (ph·∫£i t·ªìn t·∫°i trong DB)
5. Upload l·∫°i qua API Import

item.name: 11. Import Menu Items from Excel (Strict Mode)

request.description:
Import menu items t·ª´ file Excel (Strict Mode - b√°o l·ªói n·∫øu tr√πng t√™n).

**Endpoint:** POST `/api/menu/admin/menus/import/excel`

**Content-Type:** `multipart/form-data`

**Body:**
- `file` (required): Excel file (.xlsx ho·∫∑c .xls)

**Import Mode:** Strict (default)
- B√°o l·ªói n·∫øu menu item name ƒë√£ t·ªìn t·∫°i
- Rollback to√†n b·ªô n·∫øu c√≥ l·ªói
- ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o data integrity
- Validate category_id ph·∫£i t·ªìn t·∫°i

**Validation:**
- File size: Max 5MB
- File type: Only .xlsx, .xls
- Required fields: `name`, `price`
- Optional fields: `description`, `category_id`, `image_url`, `is_available`
- Category validation: category_id ph·∫£i t·ªìn t·∫°i trong DB
- Format: ExcelJS readable

**Response Success (201):**
```json
{
  "status": 201,
  "message": "Import completed successfully",
  "data": {
    "total": 10,
    "success": 10,
    "failed": 0,
    "created": 10,
    "updated": 0,
    "skipped": 0,
    "errors": [],
    "details": []
  }
}
```

**Response Error (400):**
```json
{
  "status": 400,
  "message": "Import failed",
  "data": {
    "total": 10,
    "success": 0,
    "failed": 2,
    "errors": [
      "Row 3: Menu item 'Ph·ªü B√≤' already exists",
      "Row 5: Category ID 999 does not exist"
    ]
  }
}
```

**H∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n:**
1. T·∫£i template t·ª´ API "Download Excel Template"
2. ƒêi·ªÅn d·ªØ li·ªáu v√†o file
3. ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o category_id h·ª£p l·ªá
4. Upload file qua form-data v·ªõi key `file`
5. Ki·ªÉm tra k·∫øt qu·∫£ import

**Note:** ƒê·ªÉ test API n√†y trong Postman:
1. Ch·ªçn Body tab
2. Ch·ªçn form-data
3. Key: `file`, Type: File
4. Ch·ªçn file Excel t·ª´ m√°y t√≠nh

Import menu items v·ªõi ch·∫ø ƒë·ªô Update - t·ª± ƒë·ªông c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t n·∫øu tr√πng t√™n.

**Endpoint:** POST `/api/menu/admin/menus/import/excel`

**Body:**

**Import Mode:** Update
- T·ª± ƒë·ªông c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t menu item n·∫øu t√™n ƒë√£ t·ªìn t·∫°i

**Response:**

item.description:
**üìä Excel Operations**

Nh√≥m c√°c API li√™n quan ƒë·∫øn Excel import/export cho Menu Item management.

**Features:**
- ‚úÖ Export danh s√°ch menu items ra Excel v·ªõi format ƒë·∫πp
- ‚úÖ Download template Excel ƒë·ªÉ import
- ‚úÖ Import menu items t·ª´ Excel v·ªõi 3 modes:
  - **Strict Mode**: B√°o l·ªói n·∫øu tr√πng (default)
  - **Update Mode**: T·ª± ƒë·ªông update n·∫øu tr√πng
  - **Skip Mode**: B·ªè qua n·∫øu tr√πng

**File Validation:**
- Max size: 5MB
- Allowed types: .xlsx, .xls
- Format: ExcelJS compatible

**Transaction Support:**
- Rollback n·∫øu c√≥ l·ªói (Strict mode)
- Atomic operations
- Data integrity guaranteed

**Category Validation:**
- category_id ph·∫£i t·ªìn t·∫°i trong database
- N·∫øu kh√¥ng h·ª£p l·ªá, rollback transaction
